website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S 8.4 tablet has supremely elegant hardware, a beautiful display, and fast Android performance.
cons: GPU and Wi-Fi performance could be better
No word on an Android Lollipop update

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tablet
customer_reviews.text: For me personally the best tablet.Superb amoled screen,good speakers for watching movis.Quick and rensponsive. Great all arounder.Can't recommend it enough. Its a shame Samsung now makes this line in 4:3 aspect only so I can't upgrade.The 16:9 feels easier to handle and its better for watching movies and TV.
customer_reviews.author: Dorota Rerutkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Great..
customer_reviews.text: Great....for fb, emails, reading, takes fantastic pictures and film, the memory seems adequate, the battery lasts well and charges quickly. The only disadvantages i've found seems to be the speed at which it shuts itself off after inactivity,and is then a pest to log on and take more photos. But i'm still delighted with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tablet for myself and I can say it's been the best tablet that I've ever had. The screen is just the right size and the colours are Crystal clear and bright. The tablets processor is very quick too very impressive tablet.
customer_reviews.author: karen jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tablet with stunning screen
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous tablet! Amazing HD AMOLED screen. Best on the market (including the tab s2 which in my opinion is NOT an upgrade!). Fast, smooth, beautiful screen. Snap it up before your unable to get the model any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic tablet. It is very thin and light
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic tablet. It is very thin and light and has an outstanding display. It is very high spec and operates seamlessly Arrived in time and I had it up and running same day. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: inderjit

customer_reviews.title: New to me tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Very good as a fast tablet. Difficult to read tiny icons without glasses, and not easy to connect to new wifi.
customer_reviews.author: R K PINHEY

customer_reviews.title: Great screen resolution
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. My advice would be buy the 32 gb if you can. I have the 16gb and soon needed to move apps and images to the micro sd added card. Again a large micro sd is a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: rj2para

customer_reviews.title: Had this for a while now and starting to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a while now and starting to get some problems. As usual loads of preload junk whihc you cannot remove. Other than that its a reasonable bit of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for nostalgic reasons. However it's now too slow and also a little loose around the charging area, it may have been opened before. Never a good idea to buy electronics second hand :(
customer_reviews.author: Abs

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic tablet. It is very thin and light and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic tablet. It is very thin and light and has an outstanding display. It is very high spec and operates seamlessly.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product at the price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product at the price. I was looking for the 32gb Samsung Galaxy but found it too expensive and settled on this which I'm very happy with. Communication from the seller with a couple of questions I had, was excellent, and prompt.
customer_reviews.author: S Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, immaculate as described, I am extremely happy with this product would buy again from the seller 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Baz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the best shape of any tablets and display as well
customer_reviews.author: Miklos Molnar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, works very well, speedy little thing. Best companion while travelling. Love it for book reading too
customer_reviews.author: Emilija Venckute

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This tablet lives up totally to my expectations. So far I am extremely pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: criticalmass

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: poor battery, even on stand by it loses 1/5 of the power in a day.
customer_reviews.author: Gibby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's brilliant! I love the size. The screen brightness is very good. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bronwyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Easy to use, looks good. Just the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S 8.4 Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, bright screen, good battery life, great camera what more can I say, GREAT VALUE..
customer_reviews.author: D.Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in time and I had it up and running same day. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Anne Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Which? best buy. Would give it 5 stars but the apps and paperwork were in French
customer_reviews.author: David A Sykes

customer_reviews.title: So very near perfect..
customer_reviews.text: A very decent tablet and all you could want; it's fast, graphics on the screen are spot on and it provides a very nice user experience. Touchwiz has also evolved over the past few years, so much better than the years of my Galaxy S2. Only slight downfall of this tablet is the battery, doesn't last as long as my iPad and seems to use a lot of power when it's idle. Overall a great tablet running Android for decent price and all the features you would expect of a tablet in 2015.
customer_reviews.author: BENJAMIN SADLER

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Definitely lived up to expectations. We have both a Galaxy Tab 2 7 and a Galaxy tab 2 10.1, both of which have served us well. The 8.4 tab combines the best of the both machines with the added benefits of a better screen and a faster processor. Really pleased we took the plunge and bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Browser

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Tablet with the option to add a Micro SD Card for massive memory
customer_reviews.text: I already had a Galaxy Tab S 10.1 and purchased this for my wife. Very easy to set-up and great quality. The screen is fantastic due to the high resolution. We uses to have all Apple stuff and have fully migrated to Samsung and find the operating system much more flexible and the fact that you can add a 64Gb micro SD card gives you massive storage. Highly recommmend!
customer_reviews.author: Lastboyscoutuk

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoying this tablet so far.
customer_reviews.text: Visuals are gorgous, games like plants vs zombies 2 look amazing and add something for me. So far I'm very happy. If you like vibrant colours then this tablet can't be beaten, only gripe is battery life, which seems to go flat even when it's not being used!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Well I don't love it but my partner who I bought it for ...
customer_reviews.text: Well I don't love it but my partner who I bought it for loves it. It's expensive and comes full of Samsung "extra's" but the display is dazzling and with a micro SD card added her tablet now boasts 48GB of storage. It's fast and I was surprised that a system update was done only a day after she received it. Fantastic tablet, well worth the money spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Winter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit of a technophobe but it was time to buy a small tablet as I've been travelling a bit with work and didn't want to carry my laptop with me too. It is very easy to use, ever so light, fits perfectly to its case and the quality of images is just amazing. A couple of friends who have ipads are considering changing because of the picture quality. I already have and would definitely recommend this product again.
customer_reviews.author: rozzer

customer_reviews.title: A big improvement on my 3 year old Nexus 7
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase - it arrived the day after I ordered it and was easy to set-up. The AMOLED screen is crystal clear with sharply defined text and vivid colours and the 8 core processor makes for a smooth responsive user interface. A big improvement on my 3 year old Nexus 7.
customer_reviews.author: Kolly Kibber

customer_reviews.title: Great screen. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present. Now I want one for myself to replace my iPad mini ... The screen is very sharp and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Alpz

customer_reviews.title: A great tablet for size
customer_reviews.text: A great tablet for size, ease of use, clarity of the screen and ability to link with other Samsung smart products.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good tablet. Perfect size, awesome screen and very fast. Nothing bad to say.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality Pictures
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my Grandma. She wanted it mainly for taking pictures because it has a large screen, and the images are amazing quality.

customer_reviews.title: New tablet
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Far too much pre-loaded software, but most of it can be ignored. Some difficulty transferring apps, etc from old tablet to new, but got there eventually. Initial hassle worth it, as performance is a step up.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Williamson

customer_reviews.title: a really great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: a really great piece of kit. My only complaint is that it is constantly upgrading so make sure you are not one a limited down wi fi deal

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant - super quality display - the gps works very well and fast.

customer_reviews.title: A good tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Read many reviews before purchase. Has stood up to expectations. Second review: This is the second one as the first failed with switching off by itself with bright white flashes. Amazon came up trumps with a speedy replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so it was an easy choice to make
customer_reviews.text: I'd already had a sneaky peek at a friend's tablet, so it was an easy choice to make. Features I particularly like: really clear screen resolution, and a surprisingly good camera! Overall, it's lightweight, therefore easily portable, versatile, and it does everything I need for when I'm on the move. I don't ever see it becoming my only device, but for travelling I don't think there's anything better on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: cant believe how good this is, everything i wanted and needed in a tablet
customer_reviews.author: chris vowles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet, the size and the speed is excellent. Delivery was good from the supplier too.
customer_reviews.author: MR P A Ainsworth

customer_reviews.title: Fab tablet
customer_reviews.text: Fab tablet so much better than previous Samsung tablet I owned
customer_reviews.author: M E Meur

customer_reviews.title: good charge time (I'll never use it all in a ...
customer_reviews.text: A superb tablet, the right size for me, fast loads of features, reasonable speakers, good charge time (I'll never use it all in a day).
customer_reviews.author: BuzzKillington

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend, i also use it with my Pc and ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible item. Would highly recommend, i also use it with my Pc and can control my PC from this tablet. High quality picture, fast and just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: lorna

customer_reviews.title: Best Android Tablet available
customer_reviews.text: What can you say, its just the best Tablet available. This one was for my wife, I have a bronze one for me.
customer_reviews.author: Martin D

customer_reviews.title: Change to English
customer_reviews.text: Works well, as expected. Superb display which is one of the reasons I opted for Samsung. Fast enough for me - non-gamer. Sourced from Hong Kong which I wasn't expecting so delivery time was prolonged. No tracking information till it landed in UK - Stansted. Then went through Customs before onward delivery. All settings were based on Hong Kong - chinese type script. Easily changed to English in Settings.
customer_reviews.author: Ian, Devon

customer_reviews.title: Brill service by Tronixcomputers
customer_reviews.text: Super tablet, truly amazing screen and performance. Ordered through Tronixcomputers on Sunday 19 of April and today 21 of April received by Special Delivery included in the price. Awesome service 100% satisfied customer here and would highly recommend the tablet and Tronixcomputers. WELL DONE!
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant device from Samsung. My wife is delighted with her Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb peice of kit but I just need some kind ...
customer_reviews.text: Superb peice of kit but I just need some kind of justification for indulging myself in this way. I can't think of a single cost justification for it.
customer_reviews.author: Little Expertise and Less Intelligence

customer_reviews.title: It must be the best small tablet out there
customer_reviews.text: It must be the best small tablet out there. But only 16 gb . After set it's about 11gb rubish .
customer_reviews.author: anthonyj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet - a super product!
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful gift for my grandson. A lovely tablet. Packaging was excellent. Arrived very quickly and safely. Delighted with this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Move over Apple
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. My wife has an IPAD and the screen resolution has no comparison with the Tab S. I don't deny the IPAD has a great feel when used and is better than previous versions of the Galaxy tab, but this tablet when compared with price too is an awesome bit of kit. Look and feel is great and if you are a google user and have a Samsung phone this is a must have addition. I rarely put it down.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not genuine 'UK' versions!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware. After months of this tablet not functioning properly it has finally kicked the bucket...not even 12 months old yet. After contacting Samsung warranty services & giving them my product serial number they informed me that it was an Asian import, therefore it is was not covered with Samsung UK warranty. I doubt this review will ever get uploaded - my previous 2 never did but if a miracle does happen then stay away from the seller 'SmartDealsLondon'. These are not genuine 'UK' versions.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had this for long, but is living up to all expectations, so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K. J. Connell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An excellent device.I am so happy.My only gripe is that it didnt come with headphones.
customer_reviews.author: irene willie

customer_reviews.title: I don't live in Hong Kong, Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: For some reason Amazon have provided me with a Hong Kong variant without making it clear in the text of the item for sale - meaning that it has a forced Chinese keyboard and forced HongKong homepage in Chrome - crazy. I had to do a factory reset to try and get the language out of Chinese and into English when first powered on, and still get strange results in web searches with Chinese letters. Feel let down by Amazon. Great tablet, apart from that point (would give it a 5 if Amazon hadn't sent me a HK-regionalised tablet).
customer_reviews.author: A. Hayward

customer_reviews.title: love the white colour
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early. love the white colour. Very thin and lightweight to hold. Easy to set up. You can get lots of good apps for this model. Clear screen. Takes very good photos as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs A J Harding

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does work as it should and they WILL Not do Anything about it for me to do sh##
customer_reviews.author: Peter H.

customer_reviews.title: screen is epic and build quality has been good. I'd recommend this as the classic tablet
customer_reviews.text: Had for almost two years now... screen is epic and build quality has been good. I'd recommend this as the classic tablet. Tethered to my S5.. it rapid on the net and just the right size for easy manbaggin' .
customer_reviews.author: KoolKave

customer_reviews.title: Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Present for my wife and it seems to be good in the enday it's down to brand choice like all items we have the Samsung brand in many things after usino apple before !!
customer_reviews.author: Mick Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not a genuine UK Samsung product so if it breaks ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a genuine UK Samsung product so if it breaks....guess what Samsung UK will not repair it. Very unclear on purchase that this was the case so beware....
customer_reviews.author: jcm

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S 8.4-inch Tablet (White) - (ARM Exynos 5 Octa-Core 1.9GHz, 3GB RAM, 16GB Storage, Wi-Fi, Android 4.4)
product_meta.description:
The Galaxy Tab S embodies the next evolution in mobile display technology, delivering a wider range of rich and crisp colours. Its industry-leading WQXGA (2560 x 1600, 16:10) Super AMOLED display delivers more than 90% of Adobe RGB colour coverage - expressing more colours than ever before - and has a remarkable 100000:1 contrast ratio which provides deeper and more realistic images by making blacks darker and whites brighter.

The Galaxy Tab S also features additional Samsung screen technologies that go beyond the hardware specifications. The tablet's Adaptive Display ensures the best visual experience anywhere, anytime by intelligently adjusting gamma, saturation, and sharpness based on the application being viewed, the colour temperature of the viewing environment and ambient lighting. Pre-set professional modes (AMOLED Cinema and AMOLED Photo) also lets users manually adjust the display settings for bright, dynamic results for both video and photo content.

In addition, Galaxy Tab S users can fully enjoy content clearly and easily outdoors, even in bright sunlight. The tablet's advanced outdoor visibility technology makes on-screen content look bright, natural, and easy to view.

The Galaxy Tab S is made for entertainment and comes packed with a variety of content including the debut of the Samsung magazine service, "Papergarden". An optimised viewing environment for digital interactive magazines, Papergarden users will be able to view a wide range of popular magazines with vivid and true-to-life colours.

Through 'Galaxy Gifts', Samsung has teamed up with more than 30 of the world's leading mobile content and service providers to offer Galaxy Tab S users the ultimate home, work, and play entertainment experience through premium content and services across a wide range of industries.

Beautifully crafted and designed with architectural aesthetics, the Galaxy Tab S is modern and sleek. Extending this design identity, the Galaxy Tab S offers a choice of several fashionable and practically designed custom accessories (available separately).

BOX CONTAINS
Samsung Galaxy Tablet
AC Adapter
Data Cable
User Documentation
feature_bullets: Experience stunningly vivid and true-to-life Super AMOLED picture quality
See more and do more with a range of advanced multitasking features
Enjoy slim, light and energy-efficient design with a fingerprint scanner
